author: Special Correspondent
text: Chief Minister Jayalalithaa on Monday launched ‘Amma Magaperu Sanjeevi,’ a Rs. 10 crore scheme, which will have a bouquet of 11 Siddha medicines for pregnant women and newborn. She gave the kit to five pregnant women at the Secretariat. She launched MRI scan facility at Egmore Children’s Hospital at a cost of Rs. 5.05 crore.
title: Amma Magaperu Sanjeevi scheme launched
